document_data.name: Bronn Selgard
document_data.Abilities: Bronn was known for his great strength.
document_data.Family:
Bronn's wife was named [[Leath]]. Together, they produced a very large family, many of which were trained in the smithy:
* [[Aleena]], eldest and daughter, journeyman apprentice
* [[Surd]], son, journeyman apprentice
* [[Doans]], son, journeyman apprentice
* [[Traith]], daughter, apprentice
* [[Berr]], son, apprentice
* [[Janth]], son, apprentice
* [[Silmur]], son
* [[Helve]], son
* [[Maela]], daughter
document_data.History: Bronn was killed during the [[Zhentarim]] invasion of Shadowdale by the [[Army of Darkhope]] in [[Nightal]], [[1374 DR]].
